1117553425397370880.text:
Invention and emergence go hand in hand.

Following emergent customer behaviors is important, but make sure you're addressing a core problem above all else.

Kerosene refills were an emergent problem (and business) for lamps, but were made obsolete by the lightbulb.

1118281031751049216.text:
Often phrased as “installation phase” vs. “deployment phase”

First wave companies need to solve first order problems just to get the tech to work to solve some problem/address a need.

Second wave companies solve second order problems and opportunities as a result of first wave

1118281030551556097.text:
The first companies to a new technology tend to be engineering driven due to the barrier to understanding the paradigm

That barrier lowers with tooling and abstraction which enables a second, design driven wave emerges that builds on that stack

Crypto is at the second wave
